name: opencode-ignore
description: Control what files and directories AI agents can access by using .ignore patterns, preventing them from reading sensitive files, large dependencies, or generated code.

installation.summary: Install via npm to enable .ignore pattern support for blocking AI access to specified files and directories.
installation.markdown:
## Installation

```bash
npm install -g opencode-ignore
```

Add to your OpenCode config:

```json
{
  "plugin": ["opencode-ignore"]
}
```

Create a `.ignore` file in your project root with patterns for files/directories to block.

usage.markdown:
## Usage

Create a `.ignore` file in your project root with glob patterns:

```
# Ignore dependencies
node_modules/
*.lock

# Ignore build artifacts
dist/
build/
*.min.js

# Ignore sensitive files
.env
*.key
credentials.json

# Ignore large files
*.log
*.bin
```

The plugin will automatically prevent AI agents from accessing files matching these patterns, keeping your workspace clean and focused.
